title: Greg Plays PC Building Simulator! (Part 1)
description: SPONSOR: Visit Manscaped.com today and get 20% OFF + Free International Shipping plus TWO FREE GIFTS when you use promo code 'SALAZAR' at checkout!  It's about time I give PC Building Simulator a shot! Let's see how I fare...   Consider supporting us on Patreon!   SPONSOR: Snag an OEM Windows 10 Pro key and use code 'SKGS' for a 25% discount:   Check out the Greg Plays playlist here:   Download PC Building Simulator:    My studio gear on Amazon: Sony a6600 (Primary):  Sony a6400 (Secondary):  2x Pixio PX277 Prime 165Hz IPS Monitors:  Neewer LED Lighting Kit:  Audio-Technica AT2035:  Yamaha MG10XU Mixer:  Neewer Microphone Arms:  Arrowzoom Sound-Damping Foam Panels:    Follow me on social media: TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:    Join our public Discord server:   DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our Rakuten account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.  #GregPlays
